item.title: anie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: anie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: anie add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: anie add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: anie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: anie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: anie add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: anie add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "If you look for truth, you may find comfort in the end; if you look for comfort you will not get either comfort or truth only soft soap and wishful thinking to begin, and in the end, despair." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: anie add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: anie add a quote by George Herbert
item.description: "The best mirror is an old friend." -- George Herbert

item.title: anie add a quote by Ellen Hopkins
item.description: "Taking no chances means wasting your dreams.." -- Ellen Hopkins

item.title: anie add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: anie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Seven Deadly Sins
Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: anie add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not. " -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: anie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: anie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I don't want whatever I want. Nobody does. Not really. What kind of fun would it be if I just got everything I ever wanted just like that, and it didn't mean anything? What then?" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: anie add a quote by Gregory Colbert
item.description: "The whales do not sing because they have an answer, they sing because they have a song." -- Gregory Colbert

item.title: anie add a quote by Hadrian
item.description:
"One great mistake is to try to extract from each person virtues which he does not possess, neglecting the cultivation of those which he does have.
" -- Hadrian

item.title: anie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Because,' she said, 'when you're scared but you still do it anyway, that's brave." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: anie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I have no plans to love you," said Coraline. "No matter what. You can't make me love you." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: anie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The most important thing in all human relationships is conversation, but people don’t talk anymore, they don’t sit down to talk and listen. They go to the theater, the cinema, watch television, listen to the radio, read books, but they almost never talk. If we want to change the world, we have to go back to a time when warriors would gather around a fire and tell stories." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: anie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: anie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: anie add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: anie add a quote by Paul Arden
item.description: "Great people have great egos; maybe that's what makes them great." -- Paul Arden

item.title: anie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: anie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Remember, the first road to God is prayer, the second is joy." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: anie add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light." -- Helen Keller

item.title: anie add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: anie add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith
